I’m not in the US, but over here, any propietor reserves the right to refuse service to any patron for any reason. And was the baker offering to make a Saturday lunch cake?

It’s same here and i support the right of a biz to reside service. Doesn’t mean i agree with the decision. I’ve been in the “biz” for 45 years. I was taught to always put personal feelings aside and serve guests with kindness and professionalism. Regardless of who they are.
